title: Inception
story: Dom Cobb is a thief with the rare ability to enter people’s dreams and steal their secrets from their subconscious. He is given a chance to erase his criminal history if he can successfully perform inception.

title: Interstellar
story: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity’s survival as Earth becomes uninhabitable.

title: The Dark Knight
story: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos and forces the hero to question everything he believes.

title: The Matrix
story: A computer hacker learns that his reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion to fight against the controllers of the simulated world.

title: Avatar
story: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but he becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his new home.

title: Titanic
story: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
